trans-unit.source: Represents a container that can store multiple data objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以儲存多個資料物件的容器。

trans-unit.source: Package is an abstract class that can be used to organize objects into a single entity of a defined physical format for portability and efficient access.
trans-unit.target: 封裝是抽象類別，可用來將物件組織在單一實體的定義的實體格式，可攜性和能夠有效率地存取。

trans-unit.source: A ZIP file is the primary physical format for the Package.
trans-unit.target: ZIP 檔是封裝的主要實體的格式。

trans-unit.source: Other Package implementations might use other physical formats such as an XML document, a database, or Web service.
trans-unit.target: 其他封裝的實作可能會使用其他實體的格式，例如 XML 文件、 資料庫或 Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: Like a file system, items contained in a Package are referenced in a hierarchical organization of folders and files.
trans-unit.target: 類似檔案系統資料夾和檔案的階層式組織中所參考封裝中包含的項目。

trans-unit.source: Although Package itself is an abstract class, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> derived class is used as default by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 雖然封裝本身是抽象類別，<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>依預設會使用衍生的類別<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> ("part") is the abstract class that represents an object that is stored in a Package.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>（「 部分 」） 是抽象類別，代表儲存在封裝中的物件。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> ("relationship") defines an association between a source Package or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> and a target object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>（「 關係 」） 之間定義關聯的來源封裝或<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>和目標物件。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> can be one of two types, each of which can be one of two forms: - A package-level relationship (created by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method) relates a Package to either: - A target part in the package.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>可以是下列其中一種，其中每一個都可以有兩種形式:-封裝層級關聯性 (由<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法) 與封裝相關為:-封裝中的組件作為目標。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>

trans-unit.source: - A target resource outside the package.
trans-unit.target: 的在封裝之外目標資源。

trans-unit.source: - A part-level relationship (created by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method) relates a source <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> to either: - Another target part in the package.
trans-unit.target: -的組件層級關聯性 (由<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法) 與來源<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>為:-另一個封裝中的組件作為目標。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - A target resource outside the package.
trans-unit.target: 的在封裝之外目標資源。

trans-unit.source: The relationship's source Package or source <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> is considered the "owner" of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 關聯性的來源封裝或來源<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>會被視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: When the source object is deleted, all the relationships owned by the source object are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: 刪除來源物件時，會一併刪除來源物件所擁有的所有關聯性。

trans-unit.source: The process of creating or deleting a relationship does not physically change either the source or target objects in any way.
trans-unit.target: 建立或刪除的關聯性的程序不會實際變更以任何方式的來源或目標物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> ("digital signature") is a composition of parts and relationships representing a digital signature included with a Package.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>（「 數位簽章 」） 是個組件和關係代表包含封裝的數位簽章。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>

trans-unit.source: The digital signature identifies the originator and validates that the signed parts and relationships contained in the Package have not been modified.
trans-unit.target: 數位簽章識別建立者，並驗證已簽署組件和封裝中包含的關聯性尚未經過修改。

trans-unit.source: Packages also support Digital Rights Management (DRM) which allows content elements in a Package to be encrypted with specific access rights granted to authorized users.
trans-unit.target: 封裝也支援數位版權管理 (DRM) 可讓內容項目具有特定存取權限授與授權的使用者加密封裝中。

trans-unit.source: Based on the Package architecture, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is a package type designed for storing documents based on the open [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: 根據封裝架構，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>是針對儲存在開啟文件而設計的封裝類型[XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] uses packages to store content, resources, and relationships for pages and documents using a standard ZIP file by default.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)]您可以使用封裝來儲存內容、 資源和網頁和文件依預設會使用標準的 ZIP 檔案的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: As with any ZIP file, your application can use the <xref:System.IO.Packaging> classes to store and optionally protect any type or number of data files in a single efficient-to-access container.
trans-unit.target: 任何 ZIP 檔案，您的應用程式可以使用<xref:System.IO.Packaging>類別來儲存並選擇性地保護任何類型或能夠有效率地存取單一容器中的資料檔案數目。</xref:System.IO.Packaging>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱下載開放封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格[http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> class that uses a given <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>使用類別指定<xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 封裝是受保護的建構函式的<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>抽象基底類別。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中呼叫時，封裝建構函式會初始化衍生類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 封裝檔案 IO 權限。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要開啟的封裝串流。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Saves and closes the package plus all underlying part streams.
trans-unit.target: 儲存並關閉套件，以及所有基礎的部分資料流。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> class Close and <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A> perform the same operation—there is no reason to call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A> if you call Close, or vice-versa.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>類別關閉和<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A>執行相同的作業，沒有理由来呼叫<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A>如果您呼叫關閉或反之亦然。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: Close and <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A> internally call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 關閉並<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A>在內部呼叫<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `using` statement (different from the `using` namespace directive) is the recommended way to Close and <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A> a package.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`using`陳述式 (不同於`using`命名空間指示詞) 是建議的方式關閉和<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A>封裝。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: [Writing a Package Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055) and [Reading a Package Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160034) show how to close and dispose a package by using the `using` statement.
trans-unit.target: [寫入封裝範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055)和[讀取封裝範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160034)示範如何關閉和處置封裝使用`using`陳述式。

trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]正在建立的組件。

trans-unit.source: The content type of the data stream.
trans-unit.target: 資料流的內容類型。

trans-unit.source: The compression option for the data stream.
trans-unit.target: 適用於資料流壓縮選項。

trans-unit.source: The created part.
trans-unit.target: 所建立的組件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a package-level relationship to a part with a given URI, target mode, and relationship type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 URI、 目標模式和關聯性類型中建立組件封裝層級關聯性。

trans-unit.source: A package-level relationship defines an association between the package and an associated target part or resource.
trans-unit.target: 封裝層級關聯性定義封裝和相關聯的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。

trans-unit.source: A package-level relationship can be one of two forms.
trans-unit.target: 封裝層級關聯性可以有兩種形式。

trans-unit.source: - Between a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> to a target part in the package.
trans-unit.target: -之間<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>至封裝中的目標組件。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: - Between a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> to a target resource outside the package.
trans-unit.target: -之間<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>於封裝之外的目標資源。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: In a package-relationship the package is considered the "owner" of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 封裝關聯性中，封裝會視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: When the package is deleted, all the relationships owned by the package are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: 刪除套件時，會一併刪除封裝所擁有的所有關聯性。

trans-unit.source: CreateRelationship does not physically change the target part or resource in any way.
trans-unit.target: CreateRelationship 不會實際變更的目標組件或以任何方式的資源。

trans-unit.source: The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship.
trans-unit.target: 關聯性的目標不能是另一個關聯性。

trans-unit.source: If `targetMode` is specified as <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>, `targetUri` must be a relative URI that is formed according to the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax specification.
trans-unit.target: 如果`targetMode`指定為<xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>，`targetUri`必須是相對 URI，形成根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986)統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法規格。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>

trans-unit.source: The internal relative URI can be either an absolute path that starts with a forward slash ("/") character such as "/page1.xaml" or "/images/picture4.jpg", or a relative path such as "../imagespicture1.jpg" that resolves against the package root ("/") as the base URI.
trans-unit.target: 內部的相對 URI 可以是絕對路徑，開頭為斜線 （"/"） 字元例如"/ page1.xaml"或"/ images/picture4.jpg"，或相對路徑，例如 「.../ imagespicture1.jpg"解析針對封裝根目錄 （"/"） 做為基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: If `targetMode` is specified as <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>, `targetUri` can be either an absolute or relative URI formed according to the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax specification.
trans-unit.target: 如果`targetMode`指定為<xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>，`targetUri`可以是任一個絕對或相對 URI 格式根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986)統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法規格。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>

trans-unit.source: "http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml" is an example of an absolute URI that references an external target resource "page2.xml".
trans-unit.target: 「 http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml 」 是絕對 URI 參照外部的目標資源 」 page2.xml 」 的範例。

trans-unit.source: "images/picture1.jpg" is an example of a relative URI that also references an external target resource "1.jpg" but which resolves against the URI of the package itself.
trans-unit.target: 「 images/picture1.jpg"是相對 URI，也會參考外部的目標資源 」&1;.jpg"但可解析針對封裝本身的 URI 的範例。

trans-unit.source: `relationshipType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is formed according to the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax specification.
trans-unit.target: `relationshipType`必須是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，形成根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986)統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法規格。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the package-level `relationshipType` URIs defined by the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示封裝層級`relationshipType`開放封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格所定義的 Uri。

trans-unit.source: |Package-level Relationship|Relationship Type URI| |---------------------------------|---------------------------| |Core Properties|http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/meta data/core-properties| |Digital Signature|http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/digit al-signature/signature| |Digital Signature Certificate|http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/digit al-signature/certificate| |Digital Signature Origin|http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/digit al-signature/origin| |Thumbnail|http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/meta data/thumbnail| For more information about packaging and package relationships, see section 1.3 of the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: |封裝層級關聯性 |關聯性型別 URI | |---------------------------------|---------------------------| |核心屬性 | http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/meta 資料/核心屬性 | |數位簽章 | http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/digit al-簽章/簽章 | |數位簽章憑證 | http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/digit al 簽章/憑證 | |數位簽章來源 | http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/digit al 簽章/原始 | | 縮圖 | http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/meta 資料縮圖 | 如需封裝和封裝關聯性的詳細資訊，請參閱小節 1.3 開放封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格中可供下載[http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.target: `id`必須是有效的 XML 識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes specification (see [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)).

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> derived class implementation of the abstract <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> class is provided and used.

trans-unit.source: In the default operation, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.DeletePart%2A> internally calls DeletePartCore of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> class to perform the actual delete operation based on the physical format implemented in the derived class.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a package-level relationship.
trans-unit.target: 刪除封裝層級關聯性。

trans-unit.source: A package-level relationship defines an association between the package and an associated target part or resource.
trans-unit.target: 封裝層級關聯性定義封裝和相關聯的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。

trans-unit.source: A package-level relationship can be one of two forms.
trans-unit.target: 封裝層級關聯性可以有兩種形式。

trans-unit.source: - Between a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> to a target part in the package.
trans-unit.target: -之間<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>至封裝中的目標組件。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: - Between a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> to a target resource outside the package.
trans-unit.target: -之間<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>於封裝之外的目標資源。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: In a package-relationship the package is considered the "owner" of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 封裝關聯性中，封裝會視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: When the package is deleted, all the relationships owned by the package are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: 刪除套件時，會一併刪除封裝所擁有的所有關聯性。

trans-unit.source: No exception is raised if a relationship with the specified `id` is not in the package.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有指定的關聯性，會引發任何例外狀況`id`不是在封裝中。

trans-unit.source: DeleteRelationship does not physically change the target part in any way.
trans-unit.target: DeleteRelationship 實際上不會變更以任何方式目標組件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about package relationships, see section 1.3 of the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 如需封裝關聯性的詳細資訊，請參閱小節 1.3 開放封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格中可供下載[http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id*> of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> to delete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id*>的<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref>刪除。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id*>

trans-unit.source: id is .
trans-unit.target: idis .

trans-unit.source: The package is not open (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose*> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close*> has been called).
trans-unit.target: Package 未開啟 (<>*> 或<> *> 已呼叫)。

trans-unit.source: The package is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 封裝是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: id is not a valid XML identifier.
trans-unit.target: id不是有效的 XML 識別項。

trans-unit.source: Flushes and saves the content of all parts and relationships, closes the package, and releases all resources.
trans-unit.target: 排清和儲存的所有組件和關聯性內容、 關閉封裝，並釋放所有資源。

trans-unit.source: To make sure that all changes are correctly saved, Dispose also finalizes, flushes, and closes all parts and relationships that are contained in the package.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定所有變更都會正確都儲存，Dispose 也完成、 排清，並關閉所有的組件和包含在封裝中的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> class, Dispose and <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A> perform the same operation - there is no reason to call Dispose if you call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A>, or vice-versa.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>類別，Dispose 和<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A>執行相同的作業-呼叫 Dispose，如果您呼叫沒有理由<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A>，反之亦然。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A> and Dispose internally call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A>並處置內部呼叫<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A></xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes that allocate and manage non-memory resources should override this method to release resources when Dispose is called.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別，其中配置和管理非記憶體資源應該覆寫此方法以釋放資源呼叫 Dispose 時。

trans-unit.source: Derived-class overrides should also call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A> and the base-class Dispose method to make sure that base-class cleanup is always performed.
trans-unit.target: 衍生類別覆寫也應該呼叫<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A>和基底類別 Dispose 方法，以確定該基底類別清除一律會執行。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `using` statement (different from the `using` namespace directive) is the recommended way to <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A> and Dispose a package.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`using`陳述式 (不同於`using`命名空間指示詞) 是建議的方式<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A>和處置封裝。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: [Writing a Package Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055) shows how to close and dispose a package by using the `using` statement.
trans-unit.target: [寫入封裝範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055)示範如何關閉和處置封裝使用`using`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file access setting for the package.
trans-unit.target: 取得封裝的檔案存取設定。

trans-unit.source: The FileOpenAccess property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: FileOpenAccess 屬性有沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: The file access setting is specified in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> constructor call when you create a new package, or in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A> call when you open an existing package.
trans-unit.target: 檔案存取設定中指定<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A>建構函式呼叫，當您建立新的封裝，或在<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A>開啟現有的封裝時呼叫。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref> values: <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>, <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>, or <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: One of the <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref> values: <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>, <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>, or <xref href="System.IO.FileAccess"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The package is not open (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose*> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close*> has been called).
trans-unit.target: Package 未開啟 (<>*> 或<> *> 已呼叫)。

trans-unit.source: Saves the contents of all parts and relationships that are contained in the package.
trans-unit.target: 在封裝中儲存的所有組件和關聯性所包含的內容。

trans-unit.source: Flush internally calls the derived class's <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.FlushCore%2A> implemetation to perform the actual format-specific flush operation.
trans-unit.target: 排清會在內部呼叫衍生的類別<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.FlushCore%2A>執行實際的特定格式的排清作業的實作。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.FlushCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The derived class's <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.FlushCore%2A> method is responsible for actually saving the part and relationship content to the specific physical derived class implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別的<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.FlushCore%2A>方法會負責實際儲存特定實體的衍生的類別實作的組件和關聯性內容。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.FlushCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> derived implementation of the abstract <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> base class is provided and used.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>衍生的抽象實作<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>基底類別會提供和使用。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>

trans-unit.source: In the default operation, Flush internally calls <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.FlushCore%2A> to save the parts and relationships in a ZIP file package.
trans-unit.target: 預設作業中排清在內部呼叫<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.FlushCore%2A>ZIP 檔案封裝中儲存的組件和關聯性。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.FlushCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Flush is called automatically by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 排清就會呼叫自動<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A> is called you do not have to call Flush separately.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A>或<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A>呼叫沒有個別呼叫排清。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: The package is not open (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Dispose*> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close*> has been called).
trans-unit.target: Package 未開啟 (<>*> 或<> *> 已呼叫)。

trans-unit.source: The package is read-only and cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 封裝是唯讀的而且無法修改。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, saves the content of all parts and relationships to the derived class store.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，將在衍生的類別存放區的所有組件和關聯性內容。

trans-unit.source: FlushCore is called by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A> method to perform the actual flush operation based on the physical format implemented in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: FlushCore 會呼叫<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A>方法，以執行實際的清除作業，根據在衍生類別中實作的實體格式</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the part with a given URI.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定 URI 的部分。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown if a part with the specified `partUri` does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>如果具有指定的組件，會擲回`partUri`不存在。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.PartExists%2A> method can be used to determine whether `partUri` references an existing part.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.PartExists%2A>方法可以用來判斷是否`partUri`參考現有的組件</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.PartExists%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> derived implementation of the abstract <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> base class is provided and used.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>衍生的抽象實作<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>基底類別會提供和使用。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>

trans-unit.source: In the default operation, GetPart internally calls <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.GetPartCore%2A> of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> class to return a requested part from a ZIP file.
trans-unit.target: 在預設作業 GetPart 在內部呼叫<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.GetPartCore%2A>的<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>類別，以傳回要求的組件從 ZIP 檔案。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.GetPartCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of all the parts in the package.
trans-unit.target: 傳回封裝中的所有組件的集合。

trans-unit.source: GetParts returns a collection of all parts that are contained in the package including <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts.
trans-unit.target: GetParts 傳回一組所包含的所有組件中封裝包括<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>組件。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>

trans-unit.source: GetParts will never return `null`; however, the returned collection will contain zero elements if the package contains no parts.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會傳回 GetParts `null`; 不過，如果封裝不包含的任何部分，傳回的集合將包含零個元素。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> derived implementation of the abstract <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> base class is provided and used.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>衍生的抽象實作<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>基底類別會提供和使用。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>

trans-unit.source: In the default operation, GetParts calls the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.GetPartsCore%2A> method of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> class to return the parts from a ZIP file.

trans-unit.target: 所有的集合<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>封裝中所包含的項目。

trans-unit.source: An array of all the parts that are contained in the package.
trans-unit.target: 包含在封裝中的所有組件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the package-level relationship with a given identifier.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定識別碼的封裝層級關聯性。

trans-unit.source: `id` must be a valid XML identifier.
trans-unit.target: `id`必須是有效的 XML 識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes specification (see [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)).
trans-unit.target: `id`型別是 xsd:ID，且必須遵照 XML 結構描述第 2 部分中所指定的命名慣例︰ 資料類型規格 (請參閱[http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID))。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of all the package-level relationships.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所有的封裝層級關聯性的集合。

trans-unit.source: GetRelationships will never return `null`; however the returned collection may contain zero elements if the package contains no package-level relationships.
trans-unit.target: 永遠不會傳回 GetRelationships `null`; 不過，如果封裝不包含封裝層級關聯性，傳回的集合可能包含零個元素。

trans-unit.source: A package-level relationship defines an association between the package and an associated target part or resource.
trans-unit.target: 封裝層級關聯性定義封裝和相關聯的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。

trans-unit.source: A package-level relationship can be one of two forms.
trans-unit.target: 封裝層級關聯性可以有兩種形式。

trans-unit.source: - Between a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> to a target part in the package.
trans-unit.target: -之間<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>至封裝中的目標組件。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: - Between a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> to a target resource outside the package.
trans-unit.target: -之間<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>於封裝之外的目標資源。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: In a package-relationship the package is considered the "owner" of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 封裝關聯性中，封裝會視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: When the package is deleted, all the relationships owned by the package are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: 刪除套件時，會一併刪除封裝所擁有的所有關聯性。

trans-unit.source: The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way.
trans-unit.target: 建立或刪除的關聯性的程序不會實際變更的目標組件或以任何方式的資源。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about packaging and package relationships, see section 1.3 of the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.GetRelationships%2A> will never return `null`; however the returned collection may contain zero elements if there are no package-level relationships that match the specified `relationshipType`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.GetRelationships%2A>永遠不會傳回`null`; 不過，如果沒有符合指定的封裝層級關聯性，傳回的集合可能包含零個元素`relationshipType`。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.GetRelationships%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the package-level `relationshipType` URIs defined by the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification.

trans-unit.source: |Package-level Relationship|Relationship Type URI| |---------------------------------|---------------------------| |Core Properties|http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/meta data/core-properties| |Digital Signature|http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/digit al-signature/signature| |Digital Signature Certificate|http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/digit al-signature/certificate| |Digital Signature Origin|http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/digit al-signature/origin| |Thumbnail|http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/meta data/thumbnail| For additional information, see the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: |封裝層級關聯性 |關聯性型別 URI | |---------------------------------|---------------------------| |核心屬性 | http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/meta 資料/核心屬性 | |數位簽章 | http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/digit al-簽章/簽章 | |數位簽章憑證 | http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/digit al 簽章/憑證 | |數位簽章來源 | http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/digit al 簽章/原始 | | 縮圖 | http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships/meta 資料縮圖 | 如需詳細資訊，請參閱下載開放封裝慣例 (OPC) 規格[http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。
